alert.note: Alert for Lake; Mason; Newaygo; Oceana (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Newaygo, southwestern Lake, southern Mason and Oceana Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ludington to 10 miles west of Silver Lake SP. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ludington and Hamlin Lake around 230 PM EDT. Scottville and Silver Lake SP around 240 PM EDT. Hart, Shelby and Mears around 245 PM EDT. Baldwin and Hesperia around 305 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wolf Lake, Big Star Lake, New Era, Walkerville, Baldwin Municipal Airport, Mason County Airport, Walhalla, Elbridge, St. Huberts and Stony Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
